original_text: The two disciples of John then left. Jesus spoke to the crowd about John. He said to them, ‘You went out to the wilderness. What did you go there to see? Was it a tall piece of grass which the wind was blowing this way and that? No, you did not go to see that.
korean_text: 요한이 보낸 자가 떠난 후에 예수께서 무리에게 요한에 대하여 말씀하시되 너희가 무엇을 보려고 광야에 나갔더냐 바람에 흔들리는 갈대냐

sentences.original_text: The two disciples of John then left.
sentences.korean_translation: 요한의 제자 두 사람이 그때 떠났습니다.

sentences.original_text: Jesus spoke to the crowd about John.
What did you go there to see?
Was it a tall piece of grass
which the wind was blowing this way and that?
No, you did not go to see that.
sentences.korean_translation: 아니, 너희는 그것을 보러 가지 않았다.
